org.ojai

Interface DocumentListener


  • @API.Public
public interface DocumentListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean documentArrived(Document document)
      Called when a Document from the DocumentStream is available for consumption.
      void eos()
      Called when the end of the document stream is reached.
      void failed(Exception e)
      Called when an Exception occurs while retrieving a Document.

    • Method Detail

      • documentArrived

        boolean documentArrived(Document document)
        Called when a Document from the DocumentStream is available for consumption.
        Parameters:
        document - the available Document
        Returns:
        The implementation should return false to stop listening for more documents at which point the stream is closed.

      • failed

        void failed(Exception e)
        Called when an Exception occurs while retrieving a Document. The DocumentListener will be closed and no new document will be returned.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception that describes the failure

      • eos

        void eos()
        Called when the end of the document stream is reached. The stream is already closed at this point.
